cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.10)

project(FreeImage CXX C)

# use c++ 98
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 98)

set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -O3 -w -fPIC -fexceptions -fvisibility=hidden -DOPJ_STATIC -DNO_LCMS -DDISABLE_PERF_MEASUREMENT -D__ANSI__ ${INCLUDE}")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -O3 -w -fPIC -fexceptions -fvisibility=hidden -Wno-ctor-dtor-privacy -D__ANSI__ ${INCLUDE}")

if(${CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR} STREQUAL "x86_64")
    set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -fPIC")
    set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -fPIC")
endif()



# General configuration variables:
set(INCDIR "/usr/include")

set(SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source)
# Source files
set(SRCS
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/FreeImage/BitmapAccess.cpp

    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfKeyCode.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfVersion.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfStandardAttributes.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfPixelType.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfName.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfSimd.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfArray.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfOutputStreamMutex.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfTiledRgbaFile.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfRle.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfScanLineInputFile.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfDoubleAttribute.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfGenericInputFile.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfEnvmap.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfLineOrderAttribute.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfTileDescription.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfCompressionAttribute.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmBaseConfig.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/Half/halfFunction.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/Half/halfExport.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/Half/half.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/Half/eLut.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/Half/halfLimits.h 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/Half/toFloat.h 
)

set(INCDIR 
    ${INCDIR} 
    ${SOURCE_DIR} 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/Metadata 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/FreeImageToolkit 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/LibJPEG 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/LibPNG 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/LibTIFF4 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/ZLib 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/LibOpenJPEG 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/Half 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/Iex 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmImf 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IlmThread 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/Imath 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/OpenEXR/IexMath 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/LibRawLite 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/LibRawLite/dcraw 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/LibRawLite/internal 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/LibRawLite/libraw 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/LibRawLite/src 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/LibWebP 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/LibJXR 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/LibJXR/common/include 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/LibJXR/image/sys 
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/LibJXR/jxrgluelib
)

# Create the library target

add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} STATIC ${INCLS} ${SRCS})

target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE ${INCDIR})
# Specify include directories
target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Dist)

add_custom_target(clean_all
    COMMAND rm -f core Dist/*.* u2dtmp* ${MODULES} ${STATICLIB} ${SHAREDLIB} ${LIBNAME}
)
